# RANDSUM - Universal Dice Rolling Library

> Dice notation and rolling for tabletop RPGs. Works with D&D 5E, Blades in the Dark, PbtA, Daggerheart, Root RPG, Salvage Union, and more.

## Packages

- @randsum/roller - Core dice engine
- @randsum/mcp - AI agent integration (MCP server)
- @randsum/fifth - D&D 5th Edition
- @randsum/blades - Blades in the Dark
- @randsum/pbta - Powered by the Apocalypse
- @randsum/daggerheart - Daggerheart RPG
- @randsum/root-rpg - Root RPG
- @randsum/salvageunion - Salvage Union

## Quick Start

npm install @randsum/roller

roll("4d6L")   // D&D ability score (4d6, drop lowest)
roll("2d20L+5") // Advantage attack roll
roll("2d6+3")   // PbtA / 2d6 + stat

## MCP Integration

Configure your AI agent to use RANDSUM via MCP:

{
  "mcpServers": {
    "randsum": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@randsum/mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}

Available tools: roll, validate-notation, try-roll, analyze, game-roll, batch-roll, compare, count-successes, preset.
